messages.title: The Liberal Democrats are WINNING
messages.content: Right across the UK, Jo Swinson's Liberal Democrats are winning and gaining momentum.

messages.title: The strong voice we need
messages.content: Award winning MP Luciana Berger is known as a hardworking MP who listens and gets things done.

messages.title: BUILDING A BRIGHTER FUTURE FOR OUR AREA
THE CHOICE HERE IS CLEAR:
messages.content: A vote for Lib Dem Luciana Berger is the best way to stop the Conservative candidate winning here in Finchley and Golders Green.

messages.title: VOTING LABOUR WILL ONLY HELP THE CONSERVATIVES

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Luciana is one of the country's leading anti-Brexit campaigners.
As an MP, Luciana has fought to protect public services and improve local outcomes across the country.
Luciana will always put her constituency first, making it her mission to deliver for local residents.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A vote for Lib Dem Luciana Berger is the best way to stop the Conservative candidate winning here in Finchley and Golders Green. A vote for the Labour candidate will only help Boris Johnson's Conservatives win the upcoming General Election.

issues.brexitEurope: A strong anti-Brexit voice. Luciana is one of the country's leading anti-Brexit campaigners.
issues.health: Fighting for better public services. As an MP, Luciana has fought to protect public services and improve local outcomes across the country.

politicalExperience.achievements: Luciana has a strong record of working to tackle climate change, support mental health and improve rail services in our area. She has also been a leading figure in the People's Vote campaign for a referendum on the final Brexit deal.

quotes.text: The Lib Dem fightback is real, and it's changing everything.

images.caption: Liberal Democrats group photo with caption 'The Lib Dem fightback is real, and it's changing everything.'
Luciana Berger's portrait with campaign slogans and information.
